languages.text: {n}Губернатор делает большой глоток из кубка.{/n} "Хмель ударил в голову, ничего не могу с собой поделать! В такой день и за здравие столь важных гостей преступление не выпить!"

traits.locale_text: "Судя по тому, что никто не дышит мне в затылок — всех?.." {n}От вас не укрывается вопросительная нотка в его голосе.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The governor takes a big sip from his cup.{/n} "I am a bit tipsy, so I cannot help it! On a day like today, it would be criminal not to toast such important guests!"
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор делает большой глоток из кубка.{/n} "Хмель ударил в голову, ничего не могу с собой поделать! В такой день и за здравие столь важных гостей преступление не выпить!"

{n}The governor takes a big sip from his cup.{/n} "I am a bit tipsy, so I cannot help it! On a day like today, it would be criminal not to toast such important guests!"

languages.text: {n}总督喝了一大口酒。{/n}“我喝得有点多了，这也是难免！毕竟今天是个大日子，如果不向如此重要的贵宾敬酒，那简直是在犯罪！”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor takes a big sip from his cup.{/n} "I am a bit tipsy, so I cannot help it! On a day like today, it would be criminal not to toast such important guests!"

traits.locale_text: {n}总督喝了一大口酒。{/n}“我喝得有点多了，这也是难免！毕竟今天是个大日子，如果不向如此重要的贵宾敬酒，那简直是在犯罪！”

languages.text: {n}El gobernador da un largo sorbo de su copa.{/n} «¡No puedo evitarlo, estoy ya un poco achispado! ¡En un día como hoy, sería un crimen no brindar por tan eminentes invitados!».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor takes a big sip from his cup.{/n} "I am a bit tipsy, so I cannot help it! On a day like today, it would be criminal not to toast such important guests!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador da un largo sorbo de su copa.{/n} «¡No puedo evitarlo, estoy ya un poco achispado! ¡En un día como hoy, sería un crimen no brindar por tan eminentes invitados!».

languages.text: {n}Vali, kadehinden büyük bir yudum alıyor.{/n} "Biraz çakırkeyfim, dilim dönmüyor! Böyle bir günde bu kadar önemli misafirlerin şerefine kadeh kaldırmamak büyük ayıp olurdu!"
languages.original_text: {n}The governor takes a big sip from his cup.{/n} "I am a bit tipsy, so I cannot help it! On a day like today, it would be criminal not to toast such important guests!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali, kadehinden büyük bir yudum alıyor.{/n} "Biraz çakırkeyfim, dilim dönmüyor! Böyle bir günde bu kadar önemli misafirlerin şerefine kadeh kaldırmamak büyük ayıp olurdu!"

languages.text: {n}総督は、カップから大きな一口を飲む。{/n}「私は少しほろ酔いで、できないのです！今日のような日は、こんな重要なお客様と乾杯しないなんて、嘆かわしいことです！」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor takes a big sip from his cup.{/n} "I am a bit tipsy, so I cannot help it! On a day like today, it would be criminal not to toast such important guests!"

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は、カップから大きな一口を飲む。{/n}「私は少しほろ酔いで、できないのです！今日のような日は、こんな重要なお客様と乾杯しないなんて、嘆かわしいことです！」

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur boit une grande gorgée.{/n} « Je suis un peu ivre, je n'y peux rien ! Un jour comme aujourd'hui, il serait presque criminel de ne pas porter un toast à de tels hôtes de marque ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor takes a big sip from his cup.{/n} "I am a bit tipsy, so I cannot help it! On a day like today, it would be criminal not to toast such important guests!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur boit une grande gorgée.{/n} « Je suis un peu ivre, je n'y peux rien ! Un jour comme aujourd'hui, il serait presque criminel de ne pas porter un toast à de tels hôtes de marque ! »

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur nimmt einen großen Schluck aus seinem Becher.{/n} "Ich bin ein wenig beschwipst, ich kann also nicht anders! An einem Tag wie heute wäre es ein Verbrechen, nicht auf derart wichtige Gäste anzustoßen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The governor takes a big sip from his cup.{/n} "I am a bit tipsy, so I cannot help it! On a day like today, it would be criminal not to toast such important guests!"
